DOC.brief_summary: The purpose post market study support chronic clinical performance Infinity Deep Brain Stimulation ( DBS ) Implantable Pulse Generator ( IPG ) , DBS lead , extension related system component .
DOC.criteria: Subject able provide inform consent ; Subjects diagnose Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) recommend receive DBS implant Subthalamic Nucleus ( STN ) implant Infinity system STN ; Subject must available followup visit . Subject surgical candidate ; In Investigator 's opinion subject unable tolerate multiple program session within single setting ; Subject unable comply follow schedule .
